name: AKM Space Shooter Game
description: Join the adventures and horrors where you shoot aliens and spaceships, get thrilled today with this amazing game and it's featured sound effects. The game auto-records and saves scores all the time you play the game and only erases high scores once you quit the game and re-open again. More information about the app is available in the game itself. Please don't forget to check Privacy Policy section as it has information on contacting me (The Developer) for any changes that you want to request to be made to the app to make it better.
